EVENT: System start-up
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Start-up of RTGS/SSS applications.

EVENT: Start of day processing
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Update Official Prices of securities, earmarking securities for ILF.

EVENT:
LankaSettle System opens for 
business
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: System opens for effecting transactions

EVENT:
ILF/Auto reversal of Repos and 
Standing Deposit Facility (SDF)
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Grant ILF and settle second leg of Repos of OMO and SDF

EVENT:
Maturities/Interest payments, start of 
the day (SOD) file and maturities of 
CBSL Securities
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Settlement  of  maturity  proceeds/coupon  payments  of  securities, 
effecting  LankaSettle  charges/penalties  and  maturities  of  CBSL 
Securities.

EVENT:
Multilateral Net Settlement (MLNS) 
Batch from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Main Clearing of CITS. 
SLIPS Cycles 1& 2 (of 25.03.2020)
SLIPS Cycles 1& 2 (of 26.03.2020)
SLIPS Cycle 1 (of 27.03.2020)

EVENT:
Primary Auction Settlement, Outright 
sales/ Purchases / Long Term Repo 
Auction/ Issue of Long Term CBSL 
Securities
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Settlement  of  Primary  Auction,  OMO  outright  sales,  purchases, 
Long Term CBSL Securities Auction and first leg of Long Term Repo 
Auction.

EVENT:
Multilateral Net Settlement Batch 
from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Common ATM Switch (CAS) Cycle 1 (27.03.2020)

EVENT:
Multilateral Net Settlement Batch 
from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Common  Electronic  Fund  Transfer  Switch 
(CEFTS)  Cycle  1 
(27.03.2020)

EVENT:
Multilateral Net Settlement Batch 
from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Common POS Switch (CPS) Cycle 1 (27.03.2020)

EVENT:
Reversal of Reverse Repos and 
Standing Lending Facility (SLF)
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Settlement of second leg of Reverse Repos under OMO and SLF. 
(1st leg conducted on 24.03.2020)

EVENT:
Closure of Primary Auction 
Settlement
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Settlement of securities under Primary Auction

EVENT: MLNS batch from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Common ATM switch (CAS) Cycle 2 (27.03.2020)

EVENT: MLNS batch from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Common  Electronic  Fund  Transfer  Switch 
(CEFTS)  Cycle  2 
(27.03.2020)

EVENT: MLNS batch from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Common POS switch (CPS) Cycle 2 (27.03.2020)

EVENT: MLNS batch from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: SLIPS Cycle 2 (of 27.03.2020)

EVENT: MLNS Batch from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Settlement Clearing and Adjustment Clearing.

EVENT: Cut-off time for standing facilities
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: SLF and SDF windows are closed for Participants at 1245 hrs.

EVENT:
Cut-off time for Participant managed 
ILF Repo creation
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Participants should not initiate ILF Repos after 1255 hrs.

EVENT:
Primary cut-off time for third party 
transactions
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Close  for  new  transactions  (for  T  +  0)  in  favor  of  third  parties, 
except for bank-to-bank (MT2XX) series.
